snippet: The case against Terrence J. McNeil, 25, centers on posts on social media seen as promoting specific acts of violence in the name of the Islamic State.
abstract: Federal authorities arrest Terrence J McNeil of Ohio on terrorism-related charge; hospital worker is accused of expressing support for Islamic State on Twitter in postings that also called for violence against United States service members.
lead_paragraph: The case against Terrence J. McNeil, 25, centers on posts on social media seen as promoting specific acts of violence in the name of the Islamic State.

headline.main: Ohio Man Arrested After Social Posts Urging Killing of Military Members
headline.print_headline: Ohio Man Arrested After Social Posts Urging Killing of Military Members

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
